document_data.name: Gariena
document_data.mainbody: '''Gariena''' was a [[druid]] at the [[Scarlet Moon Hall]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis in [[1491 DR]].
document_data.History: Gariena was one of the many druids deceived by the [[Cult of the Elemental Flame]] in order to unwittingly help the [[Rite of the Wicker Giant]].
document_data.Personality: Gariena sensed that the rite at the Scarlet Moon Hall would be a great event but wondered why it needed such a long preparation time and why she had never heard before about this rite.
